page.title: 03Industry in NE Wolverhampton
page.content: Unemployment is the main problem in Low Hill.There is high unemployment in Low Hill.There is no heavy industry.Most of the employment is light industry eg,shops.There used to be a British Leyland factory called Guys.It closed down in 1980 because of out of date machinery and lack of money.They made parts of buses and lorries.There used to be an Ever Ready factory.It was closed down in 1979 the same reason as Guys.It made all kinds of batteries.The nearest industrial estate is in Park Lane.It's called Fallings Park Industrial Estate. There is also is a factory called Britool. It is moving to Cannock. It makes spanners,pliers etc. There is some light industry. Where the Post Office is, used to be Squires the grocer. grocer. Where Fairview is, used to be a lauderette.
